categories: Client libraries for browser, which work in Node.JS

libs.name: adal-node
libs.description: Windows Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL) for Node.js.

libs.name: node-sp-auth
libs.description: Unattended SharePoint http authentication with Node.js.

libs.name: sp-request
libs.description: Simplified SharePoint HTTP client.

libs.name: sp-rest-proxy
libs.description: SharePoint REST API Proxy for Node.js and Express local serve.

libs.name: sharepointconnector
libs.description: A Node.js SharePoint Client inherited from sharepointer.

libs.name: PnP-JS-Core
libs.description: PnP JavaScript Core component, a fluent API for working with the full SharePoint REST API as well as utility and helper functions. See [node-pnp-js](https://github.com/s-KaiNet/node-pnp-js) or [sp-pnp-node](https://github.com/koltyakov/sp-pnp-node) for Node.JS integration.

libs.name: sharepointplus
libs.description: A JavaScript library which offers some extended features for SharePoint entirely on client side (requires no server install).

libs.name: sprestlib
libs.description: SharePoint REST Library: JavaScript Library for SharePoint Web Services.

libs.name: spscript
libs.description: SPScript makes it easy to code against SharePoint 2013 Rest API.

libs.name: gd-sprest
libs.description: SharePoint REST Framework - an easy way to create, read, update and delete data using the SharePoint 2013, 2016 and SPO REST API.

libs.name: node-sppkg-deploy
libs.description: SharePoint APP Package Deployment.

libs.name: spfx-build-url-rewrite
libs.description: SharePoint Framework build tool that automatically re-writes URL's in the manifest.

libs.name: spfx-extensions-cli
libs.description: CLI tool to manage SharePoint Framework extensions.

libs.name: sp-workbench-api-proxy
libs.description: Provides an authenticated proxy to Office 365 + SharePoint Online or an on-prem SharePoint installation. Use as a part of development with SpFx Workbench or a custom toolchain.

libs.name: node-sp-auth-config
libs.description: Config options builder for [node-sp-auth](https://github.com/s-KaiNet/node-pnp-js).

libs.name: sp-build-tasks
libs.description: SharePoint front-end projects automation and tasks tool-belt.

libs.name: sphooks
libs.description: Cross-platform CLI for managing SharePoint list web hooks.

libs.name: sp-live-reload
libs.description: SharePoint pages live reload module for client side development.

libs.name: gulp-spcolor2scss
libs.description: Convert SharePoint spcolor-files to SASS partials.

libs.name: gulp-spcolor-stylus
libs.description: Converts SharePoint .spcolor files to .styl variables.

libs.name: spcmd
libs.description: Office 365 shell command utilities.

libs.name: sprestlib
libs.description: Convert a sharepoint wiki library into a DOCX file.

libs.name: spo-shell
libs.description: A cross-platform implementation of SharePoint shell commands written in straight ES6. No powershell cmdlets and confusing PnP installs.

libs.name: passport-sharepoint-addin
libs.description: [Passport.js](http://passportjs.org/) authentication middleware for SharePoint add-in.

libs.name: expressjs-sp-addin
libs.description: Sample SharePoint provider-hosted add-in with Express.js, [passport-sharepoint-addin](https://github.com/s-KaiNet/passport-sharepoint-addin) and PnP-JS-Core.

libs.name: passport-sharepoint
libs.description: SharePoint authentication strategy for Passport and Node.js.

libs.description: Gulp plugin for saving files inside SharePoint.

libs.description: SharePoint files download client (library and CLI) in Node.js.

libs.description: Delete files from SharePoint document libraries using Node.js without hassles.

libs.name: spsave
libs.description: Save files in SharePoint using node.js easily.

libs.name: spsave-webpack-plugin
libs.description: A Webpack plugin that allows you upload generated assets to a SharePoint site.

libs.name: gulp-spsync
libs.description: Gulp plugin for synchronizing local files with a SharePoint library.

libs.name: gulp-spsync-creds
libs.description: Gulp plugin for synchronizing local files with a SharePoint library.

libs.name: sharepoint-file
libs.description: A command-line utility for Sharepoint file operations.

libs.description: A command line tool to deploy all kind of files to SharePoint / Office 365 and set properties if specified.

libs.name: node-pnp-js

libs.name: sp-pnp-node
libs.description: SharePoint JavaScript Core Library wrapper helper for Node.js.

libs.description: Adds missing and abstracts SharePoint APIs for transparent usage in Node.js applications.

libs.name: csom-node
libs.description: SharePoint Client Object Model (CSOM) API for Node.js applications.

libs.name: generator-sppp
libs.description: SP Pull-n-Push - Yeoman generator for SharePoint client-side applications.

libs.name: SharePoint Framework generator
libs.description: A Yeoman plugin for use with the SharePoint Framework. Using this generator, developers can quickly set up a new client-side web part project with sensible defaults and best practices.

libs.name: generator-spcaf
libs.description: This generator makes it easier to run SPCAF analysis on SharePoint Framework projects.

libs.name: generator-portals-clientside
libs.description: Scaffold out your clientside sharepoint projects. It has sub-generators for components, list exports, and CSR fields.
